page.title: 15The Kings Path
page.content: On Thursday{27th June 1985}JW, Mr. Walker, Mr. Secrett, Mr. Ayres and Mr. Buck walked along the{Kings Path. Sadly Mr. Fleet and the Vicar were not able to come, but Mr. Secrett and Mr. Buck came instead. We set off at{9.25 {a.m.}We walked down to{Taylor's farm. Then we started to walk along the {Kings Path.}After a little while we turned right. The Kings Path really went straight ahead but it was just through fields. While we were walking along the path we saw a dead rabbit. On the Kings Path there were a lot of different flowers and grasses.After we had walked a short distance we had to go under a barbed wire fence and into a wood. Then we entered {Chippenham {Fen,}the nature reserve. Then we made our way to{Snailwell.}On one stretch of path we had barley on our right and sugar beet on our left. You could tell
